title: Trump is donating 50 grand to the Charleston family for shooting to get him to a safer prison.
subtitle: A fake news site used the news about Dylan Rove being beaten in prison to spread a lie about Donald Trump's donation of money to facilitate his transfer to prison.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Donald Trump donated $50,000 to ensure that the suspected shooter at Charleston Church, Dylan Ruff, was transferred to Safe Prison.
